H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H1867.def: = man; ► king of {L:Persia<SDBH:פָּרַס>}, in post-exilic times

H325.def: = man, probably to be identified with Xerxes; ◄ son of {L:Darius<SDBH:דָּרְיָוֶשׁ>} I; ► king of {L:Persia<SDBH:פָּרַס>}; husband of {L:Vashti<SDBH:וַשְׁתִּי>} and {L:Esther<SDBH:אֶסְתֵּר>}

H4074.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Japheth<SDBH:יֶפֶת>}; ► regarded as the founder of the Medians

H2233.def: = a flowering plant’s unit of reproduction, capable of developing into another such plant, in some cases also used as food

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H4427.def: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people

H4438.def: = state in which a person or deity has been entrusted with the office of {L:king<SDBH:מֶלֶךְ>} or {L:queen<SDBH:מַלְכָּה>}

H3778.def: exact meaning unknown; = class of persons skilled in magic and soothsaying; ◄ found in {L:Babylon<SDBH:בָּבֶל>}

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H4427.def: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H1841.def: = man; ► {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; one of the family heads who accompanied {L:Ezra<SDBH:עֶזְרָא>} back to {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} after the exile; one of the signatories to the {L:covenant<SDBH:בְּרִית>} document of {L:Nehemiah<SDBH:נְחֶמְיָה>}

H995.def: = state in which someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

H4557.def: = an oral or written account of something

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5030.def: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity

H2723.def: = state in which a land, building, or town has been totally destroyed, ► to the extent that nobody can live there anymore

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H4390.def: = state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

H7657.def: = state in which a countable entity is seven in number

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H136.def: originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of {L:אָדֹון<SDBH:אָדֹון>}: = way of addressing God as master and lord

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H1245.def: = action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

H8605.def: = action by which humans speak to a deity, often by raising their hands, ► requesting help or expressing their thankfulness

H8469.def: = to try to win a favorable attitude from someone else; ◄ by approaching that person in a very humble way

H6685.def: = action by which someone abstains from eating food, sometimes accompanied by mourning, prayer, and sacrifices, ◄ as a result of grief, repentance, or done as part of a ritual; ► its primary intention is to humble oneself before God and so be pleasing to him

H8242.def: = relatively large receptacle ◄ made out of leather or cloth; ► used for the storage and transportation of food and possibly other objects as well

H665.def: = powdery residue left after the burning of a substance; normally deposited outside of a village or city; ► used by mourners to put on their heads or roll themselves into; ≈ associated with things that are fine and powdery and easily scattered by the wind, with low status, and possibly with mortality as well

H6419.def: = state in which humans regard an event as likely to happen

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3034.def: literally: to confess (God's) name; hence: = action by which humans publicly admit their own shortcomings before God, or the shortcomings of the people they represent

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H577.def: = marker introducing a very humble request

H136.def: originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of {L:אָדֹון<SDBH:אָדֹון>}: = way of addressing God as master and lord

H3372.def: = state in which humans experience fear

H410.def: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H8104.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time

H1285.def: = a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses

H2617.def: = state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received

H157.def: = state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

H4687.def: = causative action by which humans or deities prescribe or instruct (other) humans or themselves how to behave or respond to a situation

H5753.def: = causative action by which deities change the shape of an object ► with the purpose of destroying it

H7561.def: = state in which humans are or are considered to be in a state of guilt before God or humans, ◄ as a result of (allegedly) having acted in a way that is contrary to the law

H4775.def: = action by which humans reject the authority of a ruler or deity to which they had formerly been subjected

H4687.def: = causative action by which humans or deities prescribe or instruct (other) humans or themselves how to behave or respond to a situation

H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

H5650.def: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

H5030.def: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H8269.def: = someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H136.def: originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of {L:אָדֹון<SDBH:אָדֹון>}: = way of addressing God as master and lord

H6666.def: = something that one considers one's rightful due

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H1322.def: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H5080.def: = state in which one's hand, which holds an instrument like an axe, is raised ► with the purpose of striking it against another object

H4604.def: = action by which humans do something to (other) humans or deities that is not in line with the behavior that they committed themselves to

H4603.def: = action by which humans do something to (other) humans or deities that is not in line with the behavior that they committed themselves to

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H309.def: = process by which an event happens later than expected

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H6419.def: = state in which humans regard an event as likely to happen

H3034.def: literally: to confess (God's) name; hence: = action by which humans publicly admit their own shortcomings before God, or the shortcomings of the people they represent

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H5307.def: = process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control

H8467.def: = state of experiencing an emotion of compassion towards other people; ► which is usually translated into action

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H6944.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H8605.def: = action by which humans speak to a deity, often by raising their hands, ► requesting help or expressing their thankfulness

H1403.def: = a heavenly creature, ► who appeared to {L:Daniel<SDBH:דָּנִיֵּאל>} twice to pass on divine messages and help him understand the visions he had seen

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H3286.def: = process by which humans become weak as a result of an extended period of activity

H2377.def: = series of pictures or events in mind of sleeping person; ≈ associated with things that disappear in a moment

H5060.def: = process or action by which the hand or another part of the body of humans gets in brief contact with an object, whether deliberately or not

H3288.def: = action by which a winged living creature moves through the air by flapping its wings

H6256.def: = a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

H6153.def: = the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed

H4503.def: = objects given to a person of high status; ► sometimes this is done on a voluntary basis as a show of respect for the recipient and in order to win that person's favor; in other cases this is done to fulfill the requirements imposed by the recipient

H995.def: = state in which someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H1841.def: = man; ► {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; one of the family heads who accompanied {L:Ezra<SDBH:עֶזְרָא>} back to {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} after the exile; one of the signatories to the {L:covenant<SDBH:בְּרִית>} document of {L:Nehemiah<SDBH:נְחֶמְיָה>}

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H6258.def: = a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

H7919.def: = state in which humans are able to accomplish whatever they attempt to do

H998.def: = state in which someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

H8469.def: = to try to win a favorable attitude from someone else; ◄ by approaching that person in a very humble way

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H5046.def: = causative action by which humans pass on information to others, usually by word of mouth

H2530.def: = process by which humans or deities experience an eager desire for a person or object

H995.def: = state in which someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

H4758.def: = the part of an object that can be seen with the eye

H7657.def: = state in which a countable entity is seven in number

H7620.def: = the cycle of seven days from the first day to the seventh, which is the {L:sabbath<SDBH:שַׁבָּת>}

H2852.def: = action by which deities make a decision regarding an event

H6944.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H3615.def: = process by which an activity comes to full completion

H6588.def: = action by which humans or groups defy an authority or a standard of behavior; by extension, can also refer to the punishment or guilt incurred from a trangression

H2856.def: = to put a seal on a written document; ► in order to confirm that the document is authentic and to keep unauthorized readers from having access to it; ≈ associated with both authenticity and secrecy

H3722.def: = causative action by which humans cover objects with a coating of a certain substance

H5771.def: = a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

H6664.def: = state in which a weight or measure is correct or accurate, in accordance with a standard

H2377.def: = series of pictures or events in mind of sleeping person; ≈ associated with things that disappear in a moment

H5030.def: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity

H4886.def: = causative action by which humans apply a liquid like oil or paint to an object by pouring or rubbing ► for the purpose of cleaning, preserving, beautifying, eating, or for consecrating for religious service

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H7919.def: = state in which humans are able to accomplish whatever they attempt to do

H4161.def: = action by which humans, deities, plants, or objects leave or emerge from a certain place or position

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H1129.def: = causative action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H4899.def: = a (non-eschatological) ruler appointed by God and anointed with oil by a prophet or priest

H5057.def: = a person in a position of high authority over a nation, a division of priests or levites, or an army

H7651.def: = state in which a countable entity is seven in number

H7620.def: = the cycle of seven days from the first day to the seventh, which is the {L:sabbath<SDBH:שַׁבָּת>}

H8346.def: = state in which a countable entity is the sixth in a range

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H7339.def: = central part of a city where people meet and where civic and commercial activities take place, usually at the intersection of streets and roads

H6256.def: = a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H8346.def: = state in which a countable entity is the sixth in a range

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H7620.def: = the cycle of seven days from the first day to the seventh, which is the {L:sabbath<SDBH:שַׁבָּת>}

H4899.def: = a (non-eschatological) ruler appointed by God and anointed with oil by a prophet or priest

H3772.def: = causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H5057.def: = a person in a position of high authority over a nation, a division of priests or levites, or an army

H7843.def: = process by which objects are affected by violence, destruction, putrefaction, pollution, blemishes, and other factors that may have a destructive impact

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H6944.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H7093.def: = state of having reached the terminal point of an event

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H8074.def: = state in which an area has become empty as a result of destruction and depopulation

H2782.def: literally: to sharpen one's tongue; hence: = action by which  humans or animals show aggression to someone else with sounds or in speech

H1396.def: = process by which humans gain strength, power, and authority, which enables them to do things that others are unable to accomplish

H1285.def: = a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H7620.def: = the cycle of seven days from the first day to the seventh, which is the {L:sabbath<SDBH:שַׁבָּת>}

H2677.def: = one part of an object or substance that has been divided into two parts

H7673.def: = process by which an activity comes to an end

H2077.def: = the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and the other part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense

H4503.def: = objects given to a person of high status; ► sometimes this is done on a voluntary basis as a show of respect for the recipient and in order to win that person's favor; in other cases this is done to fulfill the requirements imposed by the recipient

H3671.def: = part of body; ◄ of bird, insect, celestial creature; ► used for flying but also to give protection

H8251.def: = an object that is regarded as unclean and therefore treated as utterly detestable

H8074.def: = state in which an area has become empty as a result of destruction and depopulation

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H2782.def: literally: to sharpen one's tongue; hence: = action by which  humans or animals show aggression to someone else with sounds or in speech

H3617.def: = process by which an activity comes to full completion

H5413.def: = process by which water flows from heaven in the form of rain

54.gl: to be poured out > to happen with intensity
